<$list filter="[has[cpl.icon]]" emptyMessage="""<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/plugin-generic-$type$"/>""">

<$list filter="[all[current]has[cpl.version]]"><$text text={{{ [all[current]get[cpl.version]] }}}/><$list filter="[all[current]!has[cpl.version]]"><$set name="title" value={{{ [all[current]get[cpl.title]] }}}><$text text={{{ [[$:/temp/tw-cpl/plugin-callback-info]getindexsplit[|]last[]] }}}/></$set></$list></em></div> </div> <!-- æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦é‡è½½ --> <div class="tc-plugin-info-chunk tc-plugin-info-buttons"> <$set name="title" value={{{ [all[current]get[cpl.title]] }}}><$set name="requiresReload" value={{{ filter="[<requiresReload>match[true]]">{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/PluginWillRequireReload}}</$list></$set></$set> </div> </div> <div class="tc-plugin-info-dropdown"> <$list filter="[enlist{!!cpl.dependents}] [<currentTiddler>get[cpl.parent-plugin]] +[limit[1]] ~[<currentTiddler>get[cpl.title]!is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore"> <div class="tc-plugin-info-dropdown-message"> <$text text=<<dependency>>/> </$list> </div> </$list> </div> </$list> <div class="tc-plugin-info-dropdown-body"> <$list filter="[<currentTiddler>get[cpl.documentation]!match[]]"
